devdoc.author: Manajit Halder
devdoc.details: All functions are currently implemented without side effects.

FundMe__NotOwner().details: This error is thorwn if withdraw function is called otherthan owner

cheaperWithdraw().details: Withdraws fund from all funders and empty their fund

withdraw().details: Withdraws fund from all funders and empty their fund

devdoc.title: A contract for crown funding

FundMe__NotOwner().notice: Checks to make sure that msg.sender is owner

cheaperWithdraw().notice: Withdraw fund only by owner (optimized storage usage)

fund().notice: This function receives fund from anyone

userdoc.notice: This contract is to demo a sample crowd funding contract
